actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining. Hearings held.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, Forests, and Mining

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain parcels of National Forest System land to the city of Fruit Heights, Utah.

summary.text: Fruit Heights Land Conveyance Act - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture (USDA) to convey to the city of Fruit Heights, Utah, all interest of the United States in approximately 100 acres of identified National Forest System land. Requires the Secretary to reserve an easement to such land for the Bonneville Shoreline Trail. Requires the city to use such land only for public purposes.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain parcels of National Forest System land to the city of Fruit Heights, Utah.
